description:
Historical coupled ocean atmosphere simulations of the near past (1950-2014) at high and standard resolution.
For optimal comparison between models aerosol concentrations are recommended (rather than emissions).
At least one ensemble member at high resolution, minimum atmosphere 25-50 km at mid-latitudes and ocean resolution of 0.25 degrees, and a minimum of daily coupling between ocean and atmosphere.
At least one ensemble member at standard model resolution.  Initial conditions from spin-up 1950's experiment.
rationale: The period contains several phases where the surface warming rate is lower, and the multi-model multi-resolution ensemble may give some insight into this.

requirements.description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Time varying global annual mean concentrations for CO2 and other long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG
requirements.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: Apply fields of aerosol optical properties (fine and coarse mode aerosol optical depth (AOD), single scattering albedo (SSA), asymmetry parameter (ASY)) and cloud activity (anthropogenic increment in drop number, dN/N), which are easy to use and to configure (i.e., scale in amplitude for hypothesis testing).
requirements.label: Historical Aerosol Plume Climatology

requirements.description: Land surface properties will be climatological monthly/seasonally varying conditions of leaf area index (LAI), with no dynamic vegetation and a constant land use/land cover consistent with the present-day period, centered around 2000.
requirements.keywords: HighresMIP, present day, land surface properties
requirements.label: Present Day Land Surface Forcing

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which consists of historical reconstructions (1850-2014).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Historical, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Historical Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Apply ozone concentrations encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere from the ozone concentration database.
requirements.keywords: historical, ozone, concentration, O3, stratosphere, troposphere
requirements.label: Historical Ozone Concentrations

requirements.description: Apply historical stratospheric aerosol concentrations from the stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
requirements.label: Historical Stratospheric Aerosol

requirements.description: At least two simulations, one at high resolution (minimum 25-50 km at mid-latitudes), and one at the standard model resolution
requirements.keywords: high resolution, standard resolution, at least two members
requirements.label: HighAndStandardResolution

requirements.description: Initialisation is branched from the HighResMIP control-1950 simulation after spin-up.
requirements.label: 1950 Control Initialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration

requirements.description: Minimum daily coupling between ocean and atmosphere.  Preferably more frequent, 3hr or 1hr.
requirements.label: Daily Coupling
